name: Bludknock Chaser MRM
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage.

name: Breach SRM (Triple)
customPrimary: Each missile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: Lurgi Suppression Beam (Fighter)
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Lurgi Suppression Beam
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Crun Gun (Fighter)
customPrimary: Deals additional %s kinetic damage per shot to fighters

name: Louix Suppressor
customPrimary: Ships struck by this weapon tend to be pushed back. Larger massed targets are less effected.

name: Louix Extinguisher
customPrimary: Ships struck by this weapon tend to be pushed back. Larger massed targets are less effected.

name: Milton Signalgun (Fighter)
customPrimary: Shots explode in proximity to missiles. On direct hit to armour, each shot deals an additional %s damage to armor over %s seconds. This damage is not reduced by armor.

customPrimary: On direct hit to armour, each shot deals an additional %s damage to armor over %s seconds. This damage is not reduced by armor.

customPrimary: On direct hit to armour, each shot deals an additional %s damage to armor over %s seconds. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: Pomsom Blaster
customPrimary: Projectile fires arcs at nearby enemy targets (including missiles and fighters) while traveling. The damage shown is for the arcs, the projectile itself does not deal damage and will pass over ships.

name: Phlognisticator
customPrimary: Projectile fires arcs at nearby enemy targets (including missiles and fighters) while traveling. The damage shown is for the arcs, the projectile itself does not deal damage and will pass over ships.
